body_html: @suiyuan2009 Thanks a lot for the PR and sorry for the late response. There is lot of good work gone into this CL. However, a kernel initializing an input ref tensor has no precedent elsewhere in TensorFlow. Also, adding @alextp to comment as he might have more insight into this.

body: @suiyuan2009 Thanks a lot for the PR and sorry for the late response. There is lot of good work gone into this CL. However, a kernel initializing an input ref tensor has no precedent elsewhere in TensorFlow. Also, adding @alextp to comment as he might have more insight into this.
